 A RESPONSE; How about he be forced to just watch the tediously dull movie and bore him to death. Though Koyuki doing her Samurai duty to TC would be nice as well, as long as TC gets killed. The guy cannot act, I don't care what anyone says. He plays Tc playing TC playing TC. The mini-series "Shogun" was done far better. david a sigler.

Thomas Davidson <tom.davidson@...> wrote:
If anyone's interested, how about some alternative scenes from 
The Last Samurai?

My favourite would be TC captured and taken to the village, to the
house of the man he has just killed.

TC steps up, the door slams open and Koyuki sinks a short spear
straight down his gullet. She is samurai after all, and this is the
barbarian who just killed her husband.

Alt.alternative is that the kids stab him to death in his sleep.

Roll credits.

Thomas
